channel.title: Other standalone LSMs
channel.description:
Some small Linux Security modules I saw. Anything useful here @madaidan?
https://github.com/skx/linux-security-modules/tree/master/security/can-exec https://blog.steve.fi/so_i_accidentally_wrote_a_linux_security_module.html https://blog.steve.fi/linux_security_modules__round_two_.html https://blog.steve.fi/yet_more_linux_security_module_craziness___.html
Steve Kemp is a Debian dev BTW.

item.title: Other standalone LSMs
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Some small Linux Security modules I saw. Anything useful here @madaidan?

GitHub

skx/linux-security-modules

A place to store my toy linux-security modules. Contribute to skx/linux-security-modules development by creating an account on GitHub.
